1. "The Social Network" (2010) directed by David Fincher. This biopic is based on the life of Steve Jobs, the co-founder of Apple Inc. The movie portrays the conflicts and collaborations between Jobs and his colleagues.

2. "Steve Jobs" (2015) directed by Danny Boyle. This biographical film follows the life of Steve Jobs, the co-founder of Apple Inc. 

The movie explores the various phases of Jobs' professional journey, from his early days at Apple to his later years as a tech entrepreneur and investor.
